page.title: 08EXFORD, HINTON WALDRIST
page.content: My house is about 6years old.It is built of cotswold stone with a tiled roof.It has three bedrooms,a study and a bathroom on the top floor,and a livingroom,a cloakroom, a dining room a kitchen and an entrance hall.We have many electrical appliances: in the kitchen; a mixer, a washing machine, a cooker, and a fridge with a freezing compartment.In the living room; a television set and a record player.In my bedroom a television set, a radio,a cassette recorder and a zx81 computer. My dad has got 2 computers; a zx spectrum and a jupitar ace.My mother has got 2 vacuum cleaners.In the study there is also a freezer.Outside We have a hand push rotary lawn mower,a green house,an electric saw and a couple of electric drills. As my dad works from home he has many electronic machines. There is also a stone built garage.
